item.title: Competition Winner Week 1
item.description: The first winner in the Three competition on The Right Hook has been announced on George’s radio show. It is Snowgirl from Thurles who wrote The first winner in the Three competition on The Right Hook has been announced on George’s radio show. It is Snowgirl from Thurles who wrote of the Sony Ericsson C905 phone. Our favourite line in the review was: “a camera that can call people”. Â Â Â Â Â One of the prize phones from Three and Custom-1 headphones from Klipsch will shortly be on their way to Tipperary.
